greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sums of parts of partitions (i.e., their sizes) as ordered in the table A241918: a(n) = Sum_{i=A203623(n-1)+2..A203623(n)+1} A241918(i).
comment: Each n occurs A000041(n) times in total.
Where are the first and the last occurrence of each n located?
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: a(A243051(n)) = a(n) for all n, and likewise for A243052, A243053 and other rows of A243060.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 05 2014
